name: E Waste in the Games Industry
name_original: E Waste in the Games Industry
description:
Here I created a proposal for a social enterprise with a business model, statistics, research and an app mock-up to aid the sustainability issue we face within the games industry.

Within the app, you can:
View a map that navigates you to your nearest eligible stores and bins to trade or drop your e-waste to earn credits to exchange for games-related goods. 
Learn Information about waste (particularly e-waste) worldwide through updated articles, facts and statistics.
Explore a store for users to sell or trade their broken or used tech.



Each presentation is split into different sections:
The first is centred around research and acts as a preliminary project proposal 
The second is centred around project development and a strategy
The third is the final proposal
